# name

**Instance Property**

A short string to show as the name of the tool in the UI.

## Declaration

```swift
var name: String
```

## Identifying the custom tool

- **identifier**: A string that uniquely identifies the tool in the picker.

items.description: A string that uniquely identifies the tool in the picker.
items.name: identifier

title: name
